title: Version 3.0
description: Thanks for using IggyBot! You are currently using **Version 3.0**, which was completed on **11 June 2021.** New features are below!

fields.name: Revamped Verification Flow
fields.value:
The user verification system has been completely redone. New visitors to the Crusader Gaming Hub will now verify in custom, private verification channels in the server itself - previously, this took place in the user's DMs.

The actual verification system itself has been replaced with live-updating embeds, to make the process much more seamless and less cluttered. 

Once a user's verification session is complete, their verification channel will be automatically deleted. This way, you can see at a glance how many verification "sessions" are currently active. All E-Board members also have access to these verification channels, so if a user gets stuck, you can swoop in to help them!

fields.name: Additional Verification Features
fields.value:
After much deliberation, and as part of our full verification rewrite, IggyBot now supports verification for Current Students, Former Students, Prospective/Incoming Students, and Guests. 

Current Students will verify using a college email address. Former Students may verify with their college email address if they have access to it - otherwise, they may request manual verification from the moderators. Prospective Students and Guests will require manual verification. 

Requests for manual verification will be sent in the Member Log.

fields.name: Bullhorn Mode
fields.value: Bullhorn Mode was introduced in an earlier version, but has since been spruced up and bugproofed. Bullhorn Mode allows announcements to be sent via DM to "subscribed" users (i.e. those with the Bullhorn Mode role). To send an announcement through the Bullhorn, simply ` Publish ` it by right-clicking the message.

fields.name: Code Improvements
fields.value: The raw code of Iggy has been improved greatly to allow for enhanced modularity and additonal security. Future modifications of Iggy should be much easier.

fields.name: New Commands
fields.value: All of Iggy's commands have been converted to Discord's new Slash Commands system. Just type a / in chat and you'll see your options!

fields.name: Polls
fields.value: Dynamically-updating polls may now be created using the /poll create command.

fields.name: Updated User Icon
fields.value: Iggy's profile picture has been updated to match Discord's rebranding!

fields.name: New Welcome Messages
fields.value: Added [11] new titles and [3] new bodies that can generate in Welcome messages. Also, titles and bodies now support ordinal numbers (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.)
